name: Clockwork Archon
movement: 30 ft. walking speed, 30 ft. hovering speed, 60 ft. flying speed
description: The Clockwork Archon is a formidable construct, impressively built with robust armor. It has a large frame suitable for transporting allies and features transforming weapons that can switch between bludgeoning and slashing damage.
memorable: The archon's ability to act as an armored transport while also unleashing a devastating radiant attack makes it a unique battlefield presence.
goals: To serve as a frontline fighter, protect smaller allies, and demolish structures or obstacles in its path.
relations: May serve or be created by powerful spellcasters or construct makers, and often accompanies smaller allies in battle.
environment: Typically found in regions of conflict, within magical workshops, or as guardians of important sites.
strengths: High durability with 201 Hit Points and impressive melee capabilities due to high Strength score.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks, and limited versatility due to low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma.
attacks: Multiattack with a transforming weapon, dealing significant damage, and a powerful Fire from Heaven ability that affects multiple targets in a straight line.
most_powerful_ability: Fire from Heaven unleashes a radiant beam that damages multiple targets in its path.
equipment: Transforming weapon that can switch between a sword and hammer, providing versatility in damage type.
senses: Equipped with darkvision up to 60 feet and passive perception of 10.
additional_information: Armored Transport capability for small creatures
Immutable Form grants immunity to shape-altering effects
Magic Resistance provides an advantage against spells
Siege Monster ability doubles damage to structures
test_queries: construct that carries and protects allies
massive armored warrior with radiant beam attack
powerful construct effective in demolishing structures
